duties_responsibilities.duty: Build internal and external relationships and work closely with existing partnerships.
Have a high-level understanding of the processor market, river market, truck trading, hedging, spreads, and futures.
Work directly with the VP of Operations and their team on all matters involved in volume, condition, logistics, and operational hours.
Focus solely on position management, merchandising strategies, unique marketing tools, partner relationships, and total Company growth.
Ensure considerable capital investment across the commercial grain sites to increase capacities, streamline operations, and enhance technology.
Join a highly aligned team of executives within a unique reporting structure for long-term success.
